p: We extended the model to include onward transmission to sexual partners of PWID whereby infected PWID may transmit the infection to their heterosexual sex sexual partners through unprotected sex. The number of incident infections among sexual partners of PWID was estimated using input data on the proportion of PWID who had a sexual partner in the last year, HIV prevalence among PWID and among their sexual partners, and the annual number of unprotected coital acts per partnership (Additional file 1).
